subject: Tennis
Charter Schools
lead_paragraph: The Andre Agassi College Preparatory Academy in Las Vegas, a charter school opened in an at-risk neighborhood in 2001, has grown in endowment and enrollment over the last five years.
snippet: The Andre Agassi College Preparatory Academy in Las Vegas, a charter school opened in an at-risk neighborhood in 2001, has grown in endowment and enrollment over the last five years.
